rooms.description: Open-plan area combining living, dining, and kitchen. Features a large Kerala-style window for natural light, and a central cooking zone adhering to Vastu principles by placing the stove towards the east.
Spacious bedroom located in the north-east corner to promote positive energy. Includes built-in wardrobe and large windows for ventilation.
Bedroom with ample natural light, designed to be quiet and serene, placed in the north-west area following Vastu guidelines.
Smaller bedroom for guests or children, located in the south-west corner to balance energy flow.
Attached bathroom to master bedroom, featuring modern Kerala-style fixtures and Vastu aligned water elements.
Bathroom attached to bedroom2, designed for privacy and comfort.

openings.description: Main entrance located on the north side to invite positive energy.
Secondary entrance on the south side for service access.
Large east-facing window in the living area for abundant morning light.

vastu_considerations: The main entrance is positioned on the north side to encourage positive energy flow.
The kitchen and stove are placed towards the east, which aligns with Vastu principles for cooking activities.
Bedrooms are strategically located in cardinal directions (north-east, north-west, south-west) ensuring balanced cosmic energy distribution.
Natural light and ventilation are maximized through properly sized windows and open-plan living spaces.
floor_plan_description: A single-story layout designed to offer a blend of traditional Kerala aesthetics with modern functionality. The design incorporates an open-plan kitchen and living area, ensuring fluidity between spaces while adhering to local building norms and Vastu principles.
